page.title: 19Recreation
page.content: DISCO'S IN SCHOOL WEEKS DISCO'S ARE HELD ON FRIDAY NIGHTS BY THE DISCO COMMITEE ie JOHN MACASKILL AND OTHERS.THEY ARE HELD IN CROSSAPOL HALL USUALLY ON FRIDAY NIGHTS.THEY CAN ALSO BE HELD IN THE BALINOE HALL ON SATURDAY'S BY THE YOUTH CLUB WHICH IS USUALLY ONCE A MONTH. FLASHING LIGHTS,LOUD MUSIC IS THE THEME OF THE NIGHT. DRINKS AND EATABLES ARE AVAILABLE. ON FRIDAY NIGHTS THE DISCO'S LAST FROM 9pm _ 1am.BUT ON THE SATURDAY'S THEY ARE FROM 7.30pm _ 11pm.DURING THE SUMMER THEY CAN BE ON ANYDAY OF THE WEEK AND THE SAME TIMES AS THE FRIDAY DISCO'S.
